TopicTitle: Heroes Tonight - Parody Of Chasing The Sun - The Wanted [APOLLO 11 TRIBUTE]

Articles.Content:
Im better...

So much better now.

Orbit reached,over moon.

We can see it now.

Im better...

So much better now.

Look at the moon,Nearly there

we are so close now.

We've reached 20,now I can feel the heat.

After we all touch the ground

You find us Heroes Tonight.

They said we cant make it

We denied their call.

Look at us here right now.

You find us Heroes Tonight.

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight.

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight

We see Earth is fading..

We're gonna be here all night.

Till' we be docked again.

And now It feels so 'mazing... Here on the moon.

And it'll never get old again.

You find us Heroes Tonight.

I'm never,Im never down.

Being here,Lookin' Up, Earth is looking down.

Im,never,Im never down.

Here forever,forever with this around.

They said we cant make it

We denied their call.

Look at us here right now.

You find us Heroes Tonight

They said we cant make it

We denied their call.

Look at us here right now.

You find us Heroes Tonight.

Tonight...tonight...tonight...etc...

You find us (Heroes) Tonight

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight

We see Earth is fading..

We're gonna be here all night.

Till' we be docked again.

And now It feels so 'mazing... Being here on the moon.

And it'll never get old again.

You find us Heroes Tonight.

................

You find us Heroes Tonight

We see Earth is fading..

We're gonna be here all night.

Till' we be docked again.

And now It feels so 'mazing... Being here on the moon.

And it'll never get old again.

You find us Heroes Tonight.

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight.

(Ohohoohohohohhohohohohhohoho)

You find us Heroes Tonight.

So did you like it?

On the 25th of august I'll post a Neil Armstrong Parody.

P.S If you don't know the tune,here.
